head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths REDSTON, DR. ROBERT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths REDSTON, DR. ROBERT

block.p: REDSTON-Dr. Robert. September 9, 2000. Age 82. Revered physician. Beloved husband to Leona for 57 years. Loving father to Terry Cohen and Audrey Iselin. Caring father-in-law to Norman Cohen and David Iselin. Doting grandfather to Abby, Noah, Josh, Alex, Leora, Mali and Ilan. His memory will be for a blessing.
